sentences.sContent: Direct counting guarantees the quantitive accuracy you need for important experiments and radiochemical purity measurements.
sentences.sContent_eng: Direct counting guarantees the quantitive accuracy you need for important experiments and radiochemical purity measurements.
sentences.sCn: 直接计数保证了重要的实验和放射化学纯度测量需要的定量精度。

sentences.sContent: An introduction to environmental level of transuranium elements and a review of the recent advance in radiochemical analyses of them are made.
sentences.sContent_eng: An introduction to environmental level of transuranium elements and a review of the recent advance in radiochemical analyses of them are made.
sentences.sCn: 本文介绍了超铀元素的环境水平，对它们的放射化学分析的进展进行了述评。

trans.tranCn: 已含放射性同位素的化学物质
